text:
e="preserve">Barsha Lekhi (Nepali:बर्षा लेखी) (born May 5, 1993, in Saptari, Nepal) is a title winner of Miss Nepal International 2016 and environmental activist. She is second runner up of Miss International Nepal 2016. She had also represented Nepal at the Miss International 2016 beauty pageant which was held in Japan on October 27, 2016. She also won Miss Popular title in Miss Nepal 2016.
Being environmental science student she has worked at NEFIN-REDD/CC Partnership Program. Currently She is pursuing her Masters Degree in Environmental Science from Jawaharlal Nehru University.
